source:
.decl avg_except(I:number, Avg:float)    
avg_except(I, Avg) :- 
  vals(I, _),
  N = sum 1.0 : { vals(J, _), I != J },
  Total = sum V : { vals(J, V), I != J },
  Avg = Total / N.
  
changing_mean(I) :-
  vals(I, _),
  N = sum 1.0 : vals(_, _),
  Total = sum V : vals(_, V),
  Avg = Total / N,
  avg_except(I, AvgExcept),
  ((Avg > AvgExcept, Avg - AvgExcept < 0.1);
   (Avg < AvgExcept, AvgExcept - Avg < 0.1)).
author: g
